text: (Aey Muhammad) isi shaan se humne tumko Rasool bana kar bheja hai, ek aisi qaum mein jissey pehle bahut si qaumein guzar chuki hain, taa-ke tum in logon ko woh paigham sunao jo humne tumpar nazil kiya hai, is haal mein ke yeh apne nihayat meharbaan khuda ke kafir baney huey hain. Insey kaho ke wahi mera Rubb hai, uske siwa koi mabood nahin hai, usi par maine bharosa kiya aur wahi mera malja-o-mawi hai (He is my sole Resort/On Him is my trust, and to Him do I turn)
